title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing for some reason.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted to minimize the flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Notice that all tabs in the TabFolder and all frames flash excessively.
